name: mirepoix
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mix of vegetables, typically onions, carrots, and celery, that are cut into small pieces and gently fried as a base for soups, sauces, etc.: a sauce made of mirepoix, stock, and tomatoes Add a mirepoix of chopped celery, carrot, onion, and garlic, and fry gently so it softens. Add the mirepoix ingredients to the same pan and brown.
More examplesFewer examplesI sprinkled the mirepoix around the lamb in the roasting pan and cooked at 180 degrees. Mirepoix is used to flavour many soups and sauces in French and Italian cuisine.
